publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7008 John Swinney: The Councillors’ Code of Conduct – Revised Code of Conduct for Councillors & the Executive Note for the The Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Act 2000—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the Councillors’ Code of Conduct – Revised Code of Conduct for Councillors & the Executive Note for the The Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Act 2000 be approved. Supported by: Jim Mather*

S3M-7008 John Swinney: The Councillors’ Code of Conduct – Revised Code of Conduct for Councillors & the Executive Note for the The Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Act 2000—That the Local Government and Communities Committee recommends that the Councillors’ Code of Conduct – Revised Code of Conduct for Councillors & the Executive Note for the The Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Act 2000 be approved. Supported by: Jim Mather
